translation.value: The Founder of the Liberal Crime Squad
I would be known to the people as
Liberalism is forgotten. Is it too late to fight back?
The CCS starts active and extremely strong
The day I was born in 1984...
(A) the Polish priest Popieluszko was kidnapped by government agents
(B) was the 3rd anniversary of the assassination attempt on Ronald Reagan
(D) the Nobel Peace Prize went to Desmond Tutu for opposition to apartheid
(E) the Sandanista Front won the elections in Nicaragua
(A) my parents grounded me and hid my toys, but I knew where they put them
(B) my father beat me. I learned to take a punch earlier than most
(C) I was sent to my room, where I studied quietly by myself, alone
(D) my parents argued with each other about me, but I was never punished
(E) my father lectured me endlessly, trying to make me think like him
(A) I was mischievous, and always up to something
(B) I had a lot of repressed anger. I hurt animals
(C) I was at the head of the class, and I worked very hard
(D) I was unruly and often fought with the other children
(E) I was the class clown. I even had some friends
(A) my parents divorced. Whenever I talked, they argued, so I stayed quiet
(C) my parents divorced. Acrimoniously. I once tripped over the paperwork!
(D) my parents divorced. Mom slept with the divorce lawyer
(E) my parents divorced. It still hurts to read my old diary
(A) I was into chemistry. I wanted to know what made the world tick
(B) I played guitar in a grunge band. We sucked, but so did life
(C) I drew things, a lot. I was drawing a world better than this
(D) I played violent video games at home. I was a total outcast
(E) I was obsessed with swords, and started lifting weights
(A) when I stole my first car. I got a few blocks before I totaled it
(B) and I went to live with my dad. He had been in Nam and he still drank
(C) and I went completely goth. I had no friends and made costumes by myself
(D) when I was sent to religious counseling, just stressing me out more
(E) and I tried being a teacher's assistant. It just made me a target
I knew it had reached a crescendo when...
(A) I stole a cop car when I was only 14. I went to juvie for 6 months
(B) my step mom shot her ex-husband, my dad, with a shotgun. She got off
(C) I tried wrestling for a quarter, desperate to fit in
(D) I got caught making out, and now I needed to be 'cured' of homosexuality
(E) I resorted to controlling people. Had my own clique of outcasts
I was only 15 when I ran away, and...
(A) I started robbing houses: rich people only. I was fed up with their crap
(B) I hung out with thugs and beat the shit out of people
(C) I got a horrible job working fast food, smiling as people fed the man
(D) I let people pay me for sex. I needed the money to survive
(E) I volunteered for a left-wing candidate. It wasn't *real*, though, you know?
Life went on. On my 18th birthday...
(A) I got my hands on a sports car. The owner must have been pissed
(B) I bought myself an assault rifle
(C) I celebrated. I'd saved a thousand bucks!
(D) I went to a party and met a cool law student. We've been dating since
(E) I managed to acquire secret maps of several major buildings downtown
For the past decade, I've been...
(A) stealing from Corporations. I know they're still keeping more secrets
(B) a violent criminal. Nothing can change me, or stand in my way
(C) taking college courses. I can see how much the country needs help
(D) surviving alone, just like anyone. But we can't go on like this
(E) writing my manifesto and refining my image. I'm ready to lead

The public is not concerned with politics right now.
The people are most concerned about $TOPISSUE
Shift + Click to transfer entire stack
After a long primary campaign, the people have rallied around two leaders...
What a wonderful example of the democratic process
$VP has been selected by the Senate as their Vice President.
After hours of deliberation and a few fist fights, congress has finally selected $PRESIDENT as the next President.\n$VP has been selected by the Senate as their Vice President.
With the electoral college deadlocked, it falls to Congress to select a new leader...
With the election still undecided, it comes down to the recounts...
The first districts are reporting in...

Disbanding scatters the Liberal Crime Squad, sending all of its members into hiding, free to pursue their own lives. You will be able to observe the political situation in brief, and wait until a resolution is reached.\nIf at any time you determine that the Liberal Crime Squad will be needed again, you may return to the homeless shelter to restart the campaign.\nDo not make this decision lightly. If you do need to return to action, only the most devoted of your former members will return. Disband the LCS?

translatoin.value: Half cost if you have Cloth

translation.value: Assign a new Safe House to this Liberal

Sleepers need to stay in their designated workplace
Do you want to permanently release this squad member from the LCS? If they have low heart, they may go to the police.
Cannot change squads while away from Safe House
Cannot change home while away from Safe House
Cannot set activity while away from Safe House

This Liberal needs a wheelchair before they can go out again
$NAME is in no condition to join a squad!

is in no condition to be activated!
This Liberal has not yet been motivated to direct action
You can't give orders to non-Liberals!
Moving this hostage would be too risky
The Conservative is sitting alone in the dark.
The Conservative has not yet developed a relationship with $INTERROGATOR.
The Conservative clings helplessly to $INTERROGATOR as its only friend.
The Conservative would like to murder $INTERROGATOR
Trains all Liberals staying in this Safe House
Attend classes in the University District for $60 a day
Perform Community Service to improve public opinion of the LCS. Will also help keep the heat off this Liberal
Stage public demonstrations to raise awareness of Liberal Issues
Spray LCS tags and paint murals to raise awareness of Liberal Issues
Search online for the latest opinion polls
Deface Conservative websites and infiltrate Conservative networks to steal information
Write letters to the editor to raise awareness of Liberal Issues
Buy a Printing Press to write for the Liberal Guardian
Write columns and editorials for the Liberal Guardian
Solicit donations from the general public
Sell homemade clothing to raise Liberal funds
Sell artwork to raise Liberal funds
Perform street music to raise Liberal funds
Sell special adult brownies that open magical shimmering doorways to the adamantium pits.
Go on the game and trade sex for money
Go online and steal credit card numbers
Repair and clean clothing and armor
Search for a vehicle to liberate for the Liberal Cause
Trains Art, Business, Law, Music, Persuasion, Religion, Science, Street Sense, Writing, costs up to $20 per day
Trains Computers, Disguise, Driving, Psychology, Security, Seduction, Stealth, Tailoring, costs up to $60 per day
Trains all Weapon skills, Martial Arts, Dodge, First Aid, costs up to $100 per day
Use First Aid to heal Liberals
Move to recover at the Free Clinic
Sleeper $SLEEPERNAME reads the charges, trying to hide a smile:
A former LCS member will testify against $NAME.
$COUNT former LCS members will testify against $NAME.
The trial proceeds. Jury selection is first.
$LAWYERNAME ensures the jury is stacked in $NAME's favor!
$LAWYERNAME's CONSERVATIVE ARCH-NEMESIS will represent the prosecution!!!
$NAME's best friend from childhood is a juror.
A few of the jurors are closet Socialists.
One of the jurors flashes a SECRET LIBERAL HAND SIGNAL when no one is looking.
The jury is a bit Conservative.
Such a collection of Conservative jurors has never before been assembled.
One of the accepted jurors is a Conservative activist.
A few of the jurors are members of the KKK.
There is no question of $NAME's guilt.
The prosecution gives a standard presentation.
The prosecution makes an airtight case.
The defense makes a noble attempt, but the outcome is inevitable.
The defense attorney rarely showed up.
The defense attorney accidentally said "My client is GUILTY!" during closing.
The defense makes the prosecution look like amateurs.
$LAWYERNAME's arguments made several of the jurors stand up and shout "NOT GUILTY!" before deliberations even began.
$NAME makes one horrible mistake after another.
$NAME forgot where $HESHE was and shouted "DEATH TO THE PATRIARCHY" at the judge.
$NAME accidentally flips off the judge and jury multiple times.
$NAME did all right, but made some mistakes.
$NAME had the jury, judge, and prosecution crying for freedom.
The jury leaves to consider the case.
The jury has returned from deliberations.
But they can't reach a verdict!
The case will be re-tried next month.
The prosecution declines to re-try the case.
$NAME will be returned to prison to resume an earlier sentence
, less a month for time already served.
The execution is scheduled to occur three months from now.
During sentencing, the judge grants some leniency.
$NAME, you will be returned to prison to carry out your death sentence.
$NAME, the court sees no need to add to your existing sentence.
You will be returned to prison to resume it
$NAME, consider this a warning. You are free to go.
$NAME is let off with a warning.
$NAME is sentenced to life in prison.
$NAME is sentenced to $COUNT years in prison
